# Home | Sumo Logic Docs

Sumo Logic Docs - best-in-class cloud monitoring, log management, Cloud SIEM tools, and real-time insights for web and SaaS based apps.

## Getting Started

- [Get Started](https://help.sumologic.com/docs/get-started/): A guide to help you begin using Sumo Logic, covering initial setup and configuration.
- [1. Set up collector and source](https://help.sumologic.com/docs/get-started/quickstart/#step-1-get-your-data-into-sumo): Instructions on how to set up data collectors and sources for effective data ingestion.
- [2. Explore your data insights](https://help.sumologic.com/docs/get-started/quickstart/#step-2-search-and-analyze-your-data): Learn how to analyze and visualize your data for actionable insights.
- [3. Monitor and secure your environment](https://help.sumologic.com/docs/get-started/quickstart/#step-3-monitor-and-troubleshoot-your-environment): Best practices for monitoring and securing your applications and infrastructure.

## Core Features

### Data Management

- [Log Search](https://help.sumologic.com/docs/search/): Detailed information on how to perform log searches within Sumo Logic for troubleshooting and analysis.
- [Metrics](https://help.sumologic.com/docs/metrics): Overview of metrics collection and monitoring capabilities.
- [Traces](https://help.sumologic.com/docs/apm/traces): Insights into tracing requests across distributed systems for performance monitoring.

### Dashboards and Alerts

- [Dashboards](https://help.sumologic.com/docs/dashboards/): Guide on creating and managing dashboards to visualize your data effectively.
- [Alerts](https://help.sumologic.com/docs/alerts/): Instructions on setting up alerts to notify you of important events or anomalies in your data.

### Security

- [Security](https://help.sumologic.com/docs/security/): Information on security features and best practices within Sumo Logic.
- [Cloud SIEM Schema](https://help.sumologic.com/docs/cse/schema/): Schema details for the Cloud SIEM feature, including data structure and usage.

## Integrations and APIs

- [Apps and Integrations](https://help.sumologic.com/docs/integrations/): A list of available applications and integrations that enhance Sumo Logic's functionality.
- [API Docs](https://help.sumologic.com/docs/api/): Comprehensive documentation for using Sumo Logic's APIs.
- [API Reference](https://api.sumologic.com/docs/): Detailed reference for API endpoints and their usage.

## Advanced Features

- [Kubernetes Observability](https://help.sumologic.com/docs/observability/kubernetes/): Insights into monitoring Kubernetes environments with Sumo Logic.
- [Subqueries](https://help.sumologic.com/docs/search/subqueries/): Explanation of how to use subqueries for advanced data analysis.
- [SAML](https://help.sumologic.com/docs/integrations/saml/): Information on integrating SAML for single sign-on capabilities.

## Support and Community

- [Contact Support](https://support.sumologic.com/support/s): How to reach Sumo Logic support for assistance.
- [Request a Demo](https://www.sumologic.com/demos): Information on how to request a demonstration of Sumo Logic's features.
- [Community](https://support.sumologic.com/support/s/topiccatalog): Join the Sumo Logic community for discussions, tips, and shared experiences.

## Additional Resources

- [Release Notes](https://help.sumologic.com/docs/release-notes/): Updates and changes in the latest versions of Sumo Logic.
- [Submit Feedback](https://github.com/SumoLogic/sumologic-documentation/issues/new/choose): Provide feedback on your experience with Sumo Logic documentation.
- [Contribute to Docs](https://help.sumologic.com/docs/contributing/): Guidelines for contributing to the Sumo Logic documentation.

## Legal Information

- [Privacy Statement](https://www.sumologic.com/privacy-statement): Details on how Sumo Logic handles user data and privacy.
- [Terms of Use](https://www.sumologic.com/terms-conditions): The terms governing the use of Sumo Logic services.

This structured summary provides a comprehensive overview of the Sumo Logic documentation, ensuring that all relevant links and descriptions are included for easy reference.
